movies.title: Teiruzu obu zesutiria
movies.plot: In a world torn by war between two powerful nations fighting for rule and supremacy, a Sheperd must battle Malevolence and reunite humans and Seraphim.
movies.simplePlot: In a world torn by war between two powerful nations fighting for rule and supremacy, a Sheperd must battle Malevolence and reunite humans and Seraphim.

biography.bio: Ryohei Kimura is an actor, known for Haganai: I Don't Have Many Friends (2011), Teiruzu obu zesutiria (2015) and Tales of Zestiria the X (2016).
biography.name: Ryohei Kimura

biography.bio: Ryôta Ôsaka is an actor, known for The Laws of the Universe Part 0 (2015), A Lull in the Sea (2013) and Ajin (2016).
biography.name: Ryôta Ôsaka

biography.bio: Miyu Matsuki was born on September 14, 1977 in Hiroshima, Japan. She was an actress, known for Romeo x Juliet (2007), Sword of the Stranger (2007) and Teiruzu obu zesutiria (2015). She died on October 27, 2015 in Tokyo, Japan.
biography.name: Miyu Matsuki

biography.bio: Misato Fukuen is an actress, known for Darker Than Black: Gaiden (2010), Sailor Moon Crystal (2014) and Animal Crossing: The Movie (2006).
biography.name: Misato Fukuen

biography.bio: Mikako Komatsu was born on November 11, 1988 in Mie, Japan. She is an actress, known for The Garden of Words (2013), Blue Spring Ride (2014) and A Lull in the Sea (2013).
biography.name: Mikako Komatsu

biography.bio: Daisuke Ono was born on May 4, 1978 in Kochi, Japan. He is an actor, known for Attack on Titan (2013), 009 Re: Cyborg (2012) and Durarara!!x2 (2015).
biography.name: Daisuke Ono

biography.bio: Ai Kayano was born on September 13, 1987 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Blue Spring Ride (2014), Guilty Crown (2011) and A Lull in the Sea (2013).
biography.name: Ai Kayano

biography.bio: Kenjirô Tsuda was born on June 11, 1971 in Osaka, Japan. He is an actor, known for Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters (2000), Naruto: Shippûden (2007) and Dragon's Crown (2013).
biography.name: Kenjirô Tsuda

biography.bio: Hideyuki Hori was born on March 23, 1954 in Tokyo, Japan. He is known for his work on Les chevaliers du zodiaque (1986), Perfect Blue (1997) and Demon City Shinjuku (1988).
biography.name: Hideyuki Hori

biography.bio: Mami Koyama was born on January 17, 1955 in Aichi, Japan. She is known for her work on Akira (1988), Millennium Actress (2001) and Appleseed (2004). She was previously married to Tôru Furuya.
biography.name: Mami Koyama

biography.bio: Takehito Koyasu was born on May 5, 1965 in Yokohama, Japan. He is an actor, known for Sword Art Online (2012), Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion (1997) and Mobile Suit Gundam Seed (2002).
biography.name: Takehito Koyasu

biography.bio: Takayuki Sugô was born on August 1, 1952 in Chiba, Japan. He is known for his work on Naruto: Shippûden (2007), Zyuden Sentai Kyoryuger (2013) and Vexille (2007).
biography.name: Takayuki Sugô

biography.bio: Yutaka Nakano was born on January 10, 1951 in Kanagawa, Japan. He is an actor, known for Ghost in the Shell (1995), Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence (2004) and Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex - Solid State Society (2006).
biography.name: Yutaka Nakano

biography.bio: Takanori Hoshino is an actor, known for Gun x Sword (2005), The Garden of Words (2013) and Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 1 - Ghost Pain (2013).
biography.name: Takanori Hoshino

biography.bio: Hiromi Igarashi is an actress, known for Puella Magi Madoka Magica the Movie Part III: Rebellion (2013), Loups=Garous (2010) and Long Riders! (2016).
biography.name: Hiromi Igarashi
